item.description: WPI Venture Forum Life Sciences Networking Event When:              Wednesday, March 30, from 5:30 p.m. – 7:00 p.m. Where:             Gateway Park                         60 Prescott Street                         Worcester, MA Website:           http://www.wpiventureforum.org/networking33011.html Massachusetts Biomedical Initiatives and the Massachusetts Life Sciences Center are jointly hosting this coveted annual networking event. During this event, attendees may tour the Gateway Park and MBI facility to learn about the life science research and incubation brewing in Worcester. The event is open to the public and highlights the area's latest technological innovations. Discover current industry advancements and trends and new business leads or research collaborations. Massachusetts Life Sciences Center Vice President for Communications Angus McQuilken will speak at the event.
item.name: WPI Venture Forum Life Sciences Networking Event
